name: Flip and Spin
description:
A 2D puzzle game where you have to flip and rotate parts of some mutilated pictures to recreate the original ones. Play through 6 different levels and try to figure out the deep meaning behind those pictures while listening to some jazz.

Controls:
    Left Mouse Button - select tile
    E - rotate tile 90 degrees clockwise
    Q - rotate tile 90 degrees counterclockwise / anticlockwise
    W / S - flip tile on the horizontal axis
    A / D - flip tile on the vertical axis

Credits:
